import React, { useEffect } from "react"; import { Pagination, Table } from "react-bootstrap"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import Staff_Stats_cards from "./DashboardComponents/Staff_Stats_cards"; import TableDropdown from "./Dropdown/TableDropdown"; import { useDispatch, useSelector } from "react-redux"; import "./index.css"; import { dashboardActions } from "../../../../Actions"; import { decimalize } from "../../../Services/helper"; import TableDropdownProducts from "./Dropdown/TableDropdownProducts"; import { FormatAmount } from "../../../../config"; const AdminProducts = () => { const dispatch = useDispatch(); let products: any = []; products = useSelector((state: any) => state.dashboardStats?.productlist); useEffect(() => { const getDashboardProducts = async () => { await dispatch(dashboardActions.getDashboardProducts()); }; getDashboardProducts(); }, [dispatch]); console.log(products); return ( <>
{/* */}

); }; export default AdminProducts;
